org.lantern.privacy
Interface LocalCipherProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAESLocalCipherProvider, DefaultLocalCipherProvider, DummyLocalCipherProvider, MacLocalCipherProvider, SecretServiceLocalCipherProvider, WindowsLocalCipherProvider
public interface LocalCipherProvider

interface to configure and obtain a Cipher for encrypting local data. These may vary based on plaform, location, requirements of the user etc.

Method Summary
 void feedUserInput(char[] input, boolean init)
          feed in externally provided user input (eg password, phrase, etc) has no effect if requiresAdditionalUserInput() is false
 boolean isInitialized()
          returns true if the cipher has been initialized with key data and initial parameters.
 Cipher newLocalCipher(int opmode)
          Gives back a symmetric Cipher that can be used to encrypt/decrypt local data.
 boolean requiresAdditionalUserInput()
          returns true if the cipher cannot be built until additional user input is provided via feedUserInput.
 void reset()
          resets cipher internally.
 

Method Detail

newLocalCipher

Cipher newLocalCipher(int opmode)
                      throws IOException,
                             GeneralSecurityException
Gives back a symmetric Cipher that can be used to encrypt/decrypt local data.

Parameters:
opmode - initalization mode, eg Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE or Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE
Throws:
IOException
GeneralSecurityException

requiresAdditionalUserInput

boolean requiresAdditionalUserInput()
returns true if the cipher cannot be built until additional user input is provided via feedUserInput. If a cipher is requested while this is true, an exception will be thrown.

feedUserInput

void feedUserInput(char[] input,
                   boolean init)
                   throws IOException,
                          GeneralSecurityException
feed in externally provided user input (eg password, phrase, etc) has no effect if requiresAdditionalUserInput() is false

Parameters:
input - the user provided key data
init - if true, initialize the key with this input if false, validate the input against existing key data
Throws:
IOException
GeneralSecurityException

isInitialized

boolean isInitialized()
returns true if the cipher has been initialized with key data and initial parameters. ie a password has been set or a key generated and initial parameters saved by successfully building at least one cipher.

reset

void reset()
           throws IOException
resets cipher internally. Prior state information (initialization vectors, validators) will be destroyed. isInitialized will return false following this call.

Throws:
IOException
